column6: CASE WHEN RJRCUS IS NOT NULL THEN NVL(rjrcus,' ') ELSE '' END

Mapped Value: CASE WHEN RJRCUS IS NOT NULL THEN CONVERT_CODES('CUST_REL_TYPE', RJREL)
inner join gfpf on leg_cust_id = gfpf.gfcus||gfpf.gfclc
left join bgpf on gfpf.gfcus = bgpf.bgcus and nvl(gfpf.gfclc,' ') = nvl(bgpf.bgclc, ' ')
left join sx20lf sx20lf on gfpf.gfcus = sx20lf.sxcus and nvl(gfpf.gfclc,' ') = nvl(sx20lf.sxclc, ' ')
left join rjpf rjpf on rjpf.rjcus = gfpf.gfcus and nvl(gfpf.gfclc,' ') = nvl(rjpf.rjclc, ' ')
